cards.name: Adamant Will
cards.notes: Will win combats most of the time, few fail cases

cards.name: Aven Sentry
cards.notes: Key piece for the blue/white fliers deck

cards.name: Baird, Steward of Argive
cards.notes: Body is very annoying to play against, tax hits kicker decks

cards.name: Benalish Honor Guard
cards.notes: Toughness at 2 is really bad

cards.name: Blessed Light
cards.notes: Enchantment removal is good for sagas, 5 mana is quite high

cards.name: Board the Weatherlight
cards.notes: Constructed plant, you'll never have enough good historic cards

cards.name: Call the Cavalry
cards.notes: Strong on stats alone, big board impact

cards.name: Charge
cards.notes: Wants to go in creature heavy deck (16+ creatures)

cards.name: D'Avenant Trapper
cards.notes: Ability is not great, works against aggro body

cards.name: Danitha Capashen, Paragon
cards.notes: Good even without aura or equipment, ridiculous when boosted

cards.name: Dauntless Bodyguard
cards.notes: If it's in opening hand play it turn 1, still has utility late

cards.name: Dub
cards.notes: Baseline aura for aura/equip deck

cards.name: Excavation Elephant
cards.notes: Mediocre card without kicker, kicker ability is very narrow

cards.name: Gideon's Reproach
cards.notes: Fine removal spell, not particularly great

cards.name: Healing Grace
cards.notes: Doesn't make smaller creatures win combat, just not die

cards.name: Invoke the Divine
cards.notes: 4 life is nice, but start with it in sideboard

cards.name: Knight of Grace
cards.notes: Always maindeck, don't worry about opponent playing black

cards.name: Knight of New Benalia
cards.notes: 24th card, could slot into aggressive knight decks

cards.name: Kwende, Pride of Femeref
cards.notes: Strong inclusion for aura/equip deck

cards.name: Mesa Unicorn
cards.notes: Solid 2-drop, good with auras/equipment

cards.name: On Serra's Wings
cards.notes: Will be quite good in most cases, high ceiling

cards.name: Pegasus Courser
cards.notes: Good blocker early, then lifts big creatures late

cards.name: Sanctum Spirit
cards.notes: Threat of activation is real, easy to bluff on ability

cards.name: Seal Away
cards.notes: Premium removal but worse in aggro decks

cards.name: Sergeant-at-Arms
cards.notes: Crossover for black sacrifice cards, combo of bodies is fine

cards.name: Serra Angel
cards.notes: Traditionally very strong card, no different here

cards.name: Serra Disciple
cards.notes: Only playable if you really need a flier

cards.name: Tragic Poet
cards.notes: Becomes interesting if you have multiple sagas

cards.name: Triumph of Gerrard
cards.notes: Opponent will see this coming but probably won't matter

cards.name: Academy Drake
cards.notes: Flexibility in early/late game is super powerful

cards.name: Academy Journeymage
cards.notes: Aggressivly costed bounce creature if cast for 4

cards.name: Arcane Flight
cards.notes: Oriented to aggressive decks

cards.name: Artificer's Assitant
cards.notes: Not worth the base stats, don't BCSM and count on playing turn 1

cards.name: Befuddle
cards.notes: Usually will not be needed

cards.name: Blink of an Eye
cards.notes: Cheap interaction, run as many as you can get

cards.name: Cloudreader Sphinx
cards.notes: Late in the game, scry 2 can be as good as card draw

cards.name: Cold-Water Snapper
cards.notes: Could be a good target for auras, like a crappy build around

cards.name: Curator's Ward
cards.notes: Asking way too much, not worth setup cost to get cards

cards.name: Deep Freeze
cards.notes: Best in blue-white fliers

cards.name: Diligent Excavator
cards.notes: Not a wizard, rules text not relevant

cards.name: Divination
cards.notes: Baseline grade for divination, could be better or worse

cards.name: Homarid Explorer
cards.notes: Mill Giant, include only when you need the body stats

cards.name: In Bolas's Clutches
cards.notes: Will often be a first pick, weakened by good bounce spells

cards.name: Merfolk Trickster
cards.notes: Wizard tribal, flexible uses, can take a flier out of the sky

cards.name: Opt
cards.notes: Small effect, becomes an easy cut

cards.name: Relic Runner
cards.notes: Okay to get last few points of damage, plan on artifacts for historic

cards.name: Rescue
cards.notes: Easy to think of scenarios, but will not be worth a card

cards.name: Sage of Lat-Nam
cards.notes: Not enough artifacts to make worthwhile, not a wizard

cards.name: Sentinel of Pearl Trident
cards.notes: Best with sagas to get reuse, can protect legendary creatures

cards.name: Slinn Voda, the Rising Deep
cards.notes: CMC is just too high to be useful, playable only in ramp

cards.name: Syncopate
cards.notes: Syncopate the first thing you can

cards.name: Tetsuko Umezawa, Fugitive
cards.notes: Increases the value of 3/1 and 2/1 creatures tremendously

cards.name: Time of Ice
cards.notes: Huge tempo play, buys time on defense but best on offense

cards.name: Tolarian Scholar
cards.notes: 23rd card for wizard's deck

cards.name: Unwind
cards.notes: Worse than negate, untapping lands on their turn doesn't matter

cards.name: Voladian Arcanist
cards.notes: Wizard tribal but not aggresive, pairs well with instant heavy decks

cards.name: Weight of Memory
cards.notes: Worse than Divination, better if format is quite slow

cards.name: Wizard's Retort
cards.notes: Fits in wizard deck, but not usually worth running otherwise

cards.name: Blessing of Belzenlok
cards.notes: Worth running, don't wait for legendary to use it

cards.name: Cabal Evangel
cards.notes: No relevant creature types

cards.name: Cabal Paladin
cards.notes: Aggressive, mismatch between historic and aggressive strategies

cards.name: Caligo Skin-Witch
cards.notes: Grindy card at home in slower decks, side in against control

cards.name: Cast Down
cards.notes: Sometimes won't kill their best creature, but still excellent removal

cards.name: Chainer's Torment
cards.notes: Hard to tell how good it will be, doesn't affect board for 3 turns

cards.name: Dark Bargain
cards.notes: Cost is a little high but most black decks will want one

cards.name: Deathbloom Thallid
cards.notes: Solid card, run of the mill curve filler

cards.name: Demonic Vigor
cards.notes: Works best with a good ETB effect on a creature

cards.name: Divest
cards.notes: Sideboard in if your opponent has high CMC threats

cards.name: Drudge Sentinel
cards.notes: Don't forget tapping is NOT part of the cost

cards.name: The Eldest Reborn
cards.notes: Lots of value from mediocre effects, 3-for-1 when all abilities hit

cards.name: Eviscerate
cards.notes: Splashable, always prioritize if playing black

cards.name: Feral Abomination
cards.notes: Deathtouch is essentially flavor text

cards.name: Final Parting
cards.notes: Could be workable from sideboard, but not likely

cards.name: Fungal Infection
cards.notes: Really want the first one, sideboard out if no X/1 targets

cards.name: Knight of Malice
cards.notes: Always maindeck, don't worry about whether they're playing white

cards.name: Lingering Phantom
cards.notes: Base stats are bad, only decent if you can trigger ability

cards.name: Rat Colony
cards.notes: Essentially vanilla

cards.name: Settle the Score
cards.notes: Worse than Eviscerate, but not significantly

cards.name: Soul Salvage
cards.notes: Not a bad card, considering number of good creatures

cards.name: Stronghold Confessor
cards.notes: 90/10 to use kicker, but will have it's uses as 1/1

cards.name: Thallid Omnivore
cards.notes: Suffers for lack of a threaten effect, but still good

cards.name: Thallid Soothsayer
cards.notes: Meant for token decks, disagreement on value of ability

cards.name: Urgoros, the Empty One
cards.notes: Needs more toughness to be good, does not block well for 6-drop

cards.name: Vicious Offering
cards.notes: Good in the early game, then can sac worst creature in late game

cards.name: Whisper, Blood Liturgist
cards.notes: Good payoff for token decks, goes well with Soul Salvage

cards.name: Windgrace Acolyte
cards.notes: Look for graveyard synergies, self mill is not a big cost

cards.name: Yargle, Glutton of Urborg
cards.notes: I RIDE WITH YARGLE

cards.name: Bloodstone Goblin
cards.notes: Remember creatures are spells, don't count on firing the ability

cards.name: Champion of Flame
cards.notes: Have to be completely all-in on the aura/equip strategy

cards.name: Fervent Strike
cards.notes: Kindled Fury plus haste, cheap and efficient

cards.name: Fiery Intervention
cards.notes: Would always run 1 or 2, bog standard removal

cards.name: Fight with Fire
cards.notes: Both modes are really good, essentially wins the game if kicked

cards.name: Fire Elemental
cards.notes: Very unexciting in this set, no synergy, already good 5 drops

cards.name: Firefist Adept
cards.notes: Doesn't require wizard synergy, anything more than X=2 is gravy

cards.name: The Flame of Keld
cards.notes: Too much setup cost to work in limited, only +2's red sources

cards.name: Frenzied Rage
cards.notes: Lots of aura payoffs, this is one of the better ones

cards.name: Ghitu Chronicler
cards.notes: Mirror to Skin-Witch, wizard tribal and spell deck synergy

cards.name: Ghitu Journeymage
cards.notes: Very aggressive, look for bounce synergy

cards.name: Ghitu Lavarunner
cards.notes: Constructed plant, not great for anything but VERY heavy wizards

cards.name: Goblin Barrage
cards.notes: Kind of a build around, potential to do 4 to face is important

cards.name: Goblin Warchief
cards.notes: Not great due to limited number of goblins

cards.name: Keldon Overseer
cards.notes: Want 1 or 2 in red aggro, will have to play around carefully

cards.name: Keldon Raider
cards.notes: Don't have to rummage

cards.name: Keldon Warcaller
cards.notes: Treat it like a vanilla, ability will very rarely be relevant

cards.name: Orcish Vandal
cards.notes: Body is really bad, setup cost is very high, dies to any removal

cards.name: Radiating Lightning
cards.notes: Sideboard in if opponent has lots of X/1s, face damage irrelevant

cards.name: Rampaging Cyclops
cards.notes: Crushes vanilla test at 4CMC 4/4, look for tricks and removal

cards.name: Run Amok
cards.notes: Playable in aggro, good reason to fire off removal before combat

cards.name: Seismic Shift
cards.notes: Don't usually care about either effect, but you will lose to it

cards.name: Shivan Fire
cards.notes: Can't hit players, one mana instant kill spell is great

cards.name: Skirk Prospector
cards.notes: Constructed plant, don't care about ability in limited

cards.name: Skizzik
cards.notes: Three toughness is a liability, but haste+trample is great

cards.name: Valduk, Keeper of the Flame
cards.notes: This is the aura/equipment payoff you're looking for

cards.name: Warcry Phoenix
cards.notes: Not especially powerful, stats are mismatched with CMC

cards.name: Warlord's Fury
cards.notes: Filler at best, sorcery speed really hobbles it

cards.name: Wizard's Lightning
cards.notes: Playable either way, solid removal

cards.name: Adventurous Impulse
cards.notes: Not going to miss very often, would always run first one

cards.name: Ancient Animus
cards.notes: Can use on any creature, only get counter on legendary

cards.name: Arbor Armament
cards.notes: Sideboard against fliers or similar sized creatures

cards.name: Baloth Gorger
cards.notes: Both modes are excellent

cards.name: Broken Bond
cards.notes: Sideboard in like it's disenchant or naturalize

cards.name: Corrosive Ooze
cards.notes: Doesn't really fit in as 2 mana 2/2

cards.name: Elfhame Druid
cards.notes: Great card, going to be solid ramp and boost kicker spells

cards.name: Fungal Plots
cards.notes: Engine to build around self mill/sac and saprolings

cards.name: Gaea's Blessing
cards.notes: Reprint from Weatherlight, no reason to put into your deck

cards.name: Gaea's Protector
cards.notes: Not enough toughness, will always die

cards.name: Gift of Growth
cards.notes: ELMER! LOOKING GOOD, BUDDY!

cards.name: Grow from the Ashes
cards.notes: Not super impressive at 3 CMC, only interesting if you're splashing

cards.name: Grunn, the Lonely King
cards.notes: It's huge but easy to bounce and no evasion, easy to chump block

cards.name: Krosan Druid
cards.notes: 3 CMC 2/3 is not very good, but 10 life is a lot

cards.name: Llanowar Elves
cards.notes: Leads to explosive starts, could be best green common

cards.name: Llanowar Envoy
cards.notes: Helps you splash, base body is basically fine

cards.name: Llanowar Scout
cards.notes: Not the way you want to ramp, fills in as a passable 2 drop

cards.name: Mammoth Spider
cards.notes: Solid card, most green decks will want 1

cards.name: Nature's Spiral
cards.notes: Not worth playing, art work is strip mine that's growing back

cards.name: Pierce the Sky
cards.notes: Didn't give a grade, but referenced Plummet, typical sideboard C

cards.name: Primordial Wurm
cards.notes: Needs some kind of evasion, fill in 6 drop

cards.name: Saproling Migration
cards.notes: One of the engine cards for saprolings, defensive power

cards.name: Song of Freyalise
cards.notes: Dump hand turns 1 & 2, turn 3 counters stick around, but low floor

cards.name: Spore Swarm
cards.notes: Instant speed is really important, feeds saproling engine

cards.name: Sporecrown Thallid
cards.notes: Big saproling/thallid payoff card, base stats are fine

cards.name: Thorn Elemental
cards.notes: Used to be a rare, has to be a finisher

cards.name: Untamed Kavu
cards.notes: 75/25 to kick it, can be splashed

cards.name: Wild Onslaught
cards.notes: Blowout in either mode, 4 mana is a lot for a trick

cards.name: Yavimaya Sapherd
cards.notes: Remember ETB effect not death trigger, feeds saproling deck

cards.name: Adeliz, the Cinder Wind
cards.notes: Great in wizards, but don't need lots to make worthwhile

cards.name: Arvad the Cursed
cards.notes: Legendary boost isn't necessary to make the grade

cards.name: Garna, the Bloodflame
cards.notes: Probably return 1-2 creatures if you do setup work

cards.name: Hallar, the Firefletcher
cards.notes: Red and green are the kicker colors

cards.name: Raff Capashen, Ship's Mage
cards.notes: Historic spell rider irrelevant, won't matter

cards.name: Rona, Disciple of Gix
cards.notes: Emphasis on build around, needs a slow grindy deck

cards.name: Shanna, Sisay's Legacy
cards.notes: Take note, can't be targeted by ABILITIES - not spells

cards.name: Slimefoot, the Stowaway
cards.notes: Can take without any saproling support

cards.name: Tatyova, Benthic Druid
cards.notes: Can win you the game solo, play when you can drop land right away

cards.name: Tiana, Ship's Caretaker
cards.notes: Aura/equipment part is basically irrelevant

cards.name: Aesthir Glider
cards.notes: Ice Age reprint, very mediocre but include if you want historic

cards.name: Amaranthine Wall
cards.notes: Only fits in super defensive, slow decks

cards.name: Bloodtallow Candle
cards.notes: Good historic enabler, effective removal once you hit 6

cards.name: Damping Sphere
cards.notes: Constructed plant, doesn't really affect limited

cards.name: Guardians of Koilos
cards.notes: Buys back a saga, body is uninteresting

cards.name: Howling Golem
cards.notes: Helps that you have control over when you use the ability

cards.name: Icy Manipulator
cards.notes: Alpha reprint, locks down their best card for the entire game

cards.name: Jhoira's Familiar
cards.notes: Too expensive for ramp, probably not going to want trigger

cards.name: Jousting Lance
cards.notes: Equip cost is pricy, slots into RW aura/equip deck

cards.name: Juggernaut
cards.notes: Card is perenially good, decent stats regardless of walls

cards.name: Navigator's Compass
cards.notes: This card is a trap -- doesn't ramp, only fixes

cards.name: Pardic Wanderer
cards.notes: Historic enabler at best, body is too expensive

cards.name: Powerstone Shard
cards.notes: Not great in ramp, have to go deep to get any real benefit

cards.name: Shield of the Realm
cards.notes: Prevents 2 from EACH SOURCE, slots into RW aura/equip deck

cards.name: Short Sword
cards.notes: Cheap equip cost makes this, it's fine in most decks

cards.name: Skittering Surveyor
cards.notes: Fits in every deck but the most aggro, solid historic enabler

cards.name: Sorcerer's Wand
cards.notes: Damage to players only is a big drawback, finisher for aggro wizards

cards.name: Sparring Construct
cards.notes: Not worth playing a 1 mana 1/1

cards.name: Urza's Tome
cards.notes: Fine historic enabler, helps feed itself

cards.name: Voltaic Servant
cards.notes: Livable stats, combo it with icy manipulator, hand is voltaic key

cards.name: Memorial to Folly
cards.notes: Plays above ability due to being a land, swap for a card late

cards.name: Memorial to Genius
cards.notes: Plays above ability due to being a land, reload hand late

cards.name: Memorial to Glory
cards.notes: Plays above ability due to being a land, effect is not great late

cards.name: Memorial to Unity
cards.notes: Plays above ability due to being a land, pull a creature late

cards.name: Memorial to War
cards.notes: Not better than a basic Mountain

cards.name: Zhalfirin Void
cards.notes: It's fine, would not pick highly but always include 1 or 2
